attributes.action: create a law that only allows woman to drive low powered cars in bright obvious colours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: woman should not be drivers but in this day of gender equality we do indeed allow them to drive. in order to make life safer we should make women drivers more obvious so we know to stay out of there way. colour coding and minimal engine size would make everyone safer

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
